contents:
Chat GPT ist aktuell in aller Munde, nat√ºrlich habe ich auch ein paar Experimente damit durchgef√ºhrt. Diesmal habe ich versucht ein Mathe-R√§tsel von der AI l√∂sen zu lassen, hier was dabei raus kam:
Anmerkung: Ich habe die H√∂flichkeits-S√§tze der AI weg gelassen um den Text leserlicher zu halten.
Meine Anfrage ChatGPTs Antwort Kommentar Imagine a 4 digit number that multiplied by 4 gives you the same number written backwards One possible solution is the number 2002. When multiplied by 4, the result is 8008, which is 2002 written backwards. Here's the math to show that this is a valid solution: 2002 * 4 = 8008 Ok, ich versteh’ was du verstanden hast KI, also schr√§nken wir es weiter ein. What if you can not use the same number more than one time If you can't use the same number more than once, then there is no solution for this problem. This is because the number 2002 uses the digit 0 twice, and the requirement that the same number cannot be used more than once means that a solution cannot have any repeating digits. Oops, Neuer Versuch. Ok so the rules are take any 4 digit number, with no duplicates, multiply it by 4 and the result must be the same number written backwards In that case, there are indeed solutions to the problem. Here is one possible solution: 1230 * 4 = 4920 This solution works because 1230 * 4 is equal to 4920, which is the original number 1230 written backwards. √ñhhm, 4920 ist 1230 R√ºckw√§rts? Leider erneut daneben, geben wir mal etwas Hilfestellung 1230 written backwards is not 4920, it is 0321 I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. You are correct that 1230 written backwards is 0321, not 4920. In that case, there are no solutions to the problem as stated. This is because it is not possible to find a 4-digit number with no repeating digits that, when multiplied by 4, is equal to the original number written backwards. I’m pretty sure there is a solution, try 2178 as the first number. You are correct, 2178 is a valid solution to the problem. When multiplied by 4, the result is 8712, which is the original number 2178 written backwards. Here is the math to show that this is a valid solution: 2178 * 4 = 8712 Ok er zeigt mir, dass er das Problem verstanden hat, konnte aber keine L√∂sung selbst finden. now that you know a solution, do you find another one? Yes, I can try to find another solution to the problem. Here is another solution: 2468 * 4 = 9872 This solution works because 2468 * 4 is equal to 9872, which is the original number 2468 written backwards. Nun, offenbar ist die KI zwar in der Lage zu verstehen was das Grundlegende Problem ist, kann jedoch nicht auf eine eigene L√∂sung kommen. Ich habe den Versuch auch mit der Multiplikation mit 3 versucht, jedoch sind die Antworten der KI die gleichen.
summary:
Chat GPT ist aktuell in aller Munde, nat√ºrlich habe ich auch ein paar Experimente damit durchgef√ºhrt. Diesmal habe ich versucht ein Mathe-R√§tsel von der AI l√∂sen zu lassen, hier was dabei raus kam:
Anmerkung: Ich habe die H√∂flichkeits-S√§tze der AI weg gelassen um den Text leserlicher zu halten.
Meine Anfrage ChatGPTs Antwort Kommentar Imagine a 4 digit number that multiplied by 4 gives you the same number written backwards One possible solution is the number 2002.
title: Experimente mit Chat GPT

contents:
Aller Anfang ist schwer … Da bin ich also mit meinem eigenen Blogprojekt. Entstanden daraus, dass ich bei YouTube ein Video √ºber HUGO Statische Websites gesehen habe und es eine spannende Herausforderung fand.
Das Video ist jetzt schon wieder mehrere Monate her, aber wer hat schon Zeit sich dann um die Projekte zu k√ºmmern. Letztendlich waren es die Weihnachtsfeiertage 2022 die mir die n√∂tige Zeit geschenkt haben mich jetzt doch noch um den Blog zu k√ºmmern.
Was zu erwarten ist. So fr√ºh eine Prognose abzugeben was inhaltlich in dem Blog zu finden sein wird, ist schwierig. Der Blog soll in erster Linie 3 Punkte abdecken:
Ein pers√∂nliches Portfolio von mir und meiner Arbeit sein Link Ein pers√∂nliches Notizbuch sein, in dem ich Code Schnipsel oder √§hnliche Ablege damit ich Sie zentral immer wieder verwenden kann Notizen Mein pers√∂nlicher Blog in dem ich unregelm√§√üig zu Themen etwas schreibe, die mir gerade durch den Kopf gehen Verf√ºgbar f√ºr alle die es interessiert in der Hoffnung, dass irgendwem vielleicht bei einem Problem geholfen wird. Mit dem Anspruch alle Blogposts immer zweisprachig zur Verf√ºgung zu stellen. Der offensichtliche Disclaimer Auch wenn ich nat√ºrlich bem√ºht bin, dass die Postings inhaltlich korrekt sind √ºbernehme ich keine Garantien f√ºr eventuell daraus entstandene Sch√§den, auch Code-Schnipsel o.√§. werden als Unterst√ºtzung angeboten und stellen keine L√∂sung dar.
In diesem Sinne: Hello World, oder so!
summary:
Aller Anfang ist schwer … Da bin ich also mit meinem eigenen Blogprojekt. Entstanden daraus, dass ich bei YouTube ein Video √ºber HUGO Statische Websites gesehen habe und es eine spannende Herausforderung fand.
Das Video ist jetzt schon wieder mehrere Monate her, aber wer hat schon Zeit sich dann um die Projekte zu k√ºmmern. Letztendlich waren es die Weihnachtsfeiertage 2022 die mir die n√∂tige Zeit geschenkt haben mich jetzt doch noch um den Blog zu k√ºmmern.
title: Hello World

contents:
To be honest, this list is stolen, stolen from the original author of the TOHA theme I’m using for this site. Thank you for preparing this is, so I can use it as well @hossainemruz
This is a sample post intended to test the followings:
A different post author. Table of contents. Markdown content rendering. Math rendering. Emoji rendering. Markdown Syntax Rendering Headings The following HTML <h1>‚Äî<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is the highest section level while <h6> is the lowest.
H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Paragraph Xerum, quo qui aut unt expliquam qui dolut labo. Aque venitatiusda cum, voluptionse latur sitiae dolessi aut parist aut dollo enim qui voluptate ma dolestendit peritin re plis aut quas inctum laceat est volestemque commosa as cus endigna tectur, offic to cor sequas etum rerum idem sintibus eiur? Quianimin porecus evelectur, cum que nis nust voloribus ratem aut omnimi, sitatur? Quiatem. Nam, omnis sum am facea corem alique molestrunt et eos evelece arcillit ut aut eos eos nus, sin conecerem erum fuga. Ri oditatquam, ad quibus unda veliamenimin cusam et facea ipsamus es exerum sitate dolores editium rerore eost, temped molorro ratiae volorro te reribus dolorer sperchicium faceata tiustia prat.
Itatur? Quiatae cullecum rem ent aut odis in re eossequodi nonsequ idebis ne sapicia is sinveli squiatum, core et que aut hariosam ex eat.
Blockquotes The blockquote element represents content that is quoted from another source, optionally with a citation which must be within a footer or cite element, and optionally with in-line changes such as annotations and abbreviations.
Blockquote without attribution Tiam, ad mint andaepu dandae nostion secatur sequo quae. Note that you can use Markdown syntax within a blockquote.
Blockquote with attribution Don’t communicate by sharing memory, share memory by communicating.
‚Äî Rob Pike1
Tables Tables aren’t part of the core Markdown spec, but Hugo supports supports them out-of-the-box.
Name Age Bob 27 Alice 23 Inline Markdown within tables Inline¬†Markdown¬†In¬†Table italics bold strikethrough¬†code Code Blocks Code block with backticks html <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Example HTML5 Document</title> </head> <body> <p>Test</p> </body> </html> Code block indented with four spaces <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Example HTML5 Document</title> </head> <body> <p>Test</p> </body> </html> Code block with Hugo’s internal highlight shortcode <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Example HTML5 Document</title> </head> <body> <p>Test</p> </body> </html> List Types Ordered List First item Second item Third item Unordered List List item Another item And another item Nested list Fruit Apple Orange Banana Dairy Milk Cheese Other Elements ‚Äî abbr, sub, sup, kbd, mark GIF is a bitmap image format.
H2O
Xn + Yn = Zn
Press CTRL+ALT+Delete to end the session.
Most salamanders are nocturnal, and hunt for insects, worms, and other small creatures.
Math Rendering Block math: $$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$
Emoji Rendering üôà üôà üôâ üôâ üôä üôä
This is a sample post intended to test the followings:
Default hero image. Different shortcodes. Alert The following alerts are available in this theme.
This is sample alert with type="success". This is sample alert with type="danger". This is sample alert with type="warning". This is sample alert with type="info". This is sample alert with type="dark". This is sample alert with type="primary". This is sample alert with type="secondary". Image A sample image without any attribute. A sample image with height and width attributes. A center aligned image with height and width attributes. A image with float attribute. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Cras egestas lectus sed leo ultricies ultricies. Praesent tellus risus, eleifend vel efficitur ac, venenatis sit amet sem. Ut ut egestas erat. Fusce ut leo turpis. Morbi consectetur sed lacus vitae vehicula. Cras gravida turpis id eleifend volutpat. Suspendisse nec ipsum eu erat finibus dictum. Morbi volutpat nulla purus, vel maximus ex molestie id. Nullam posuere est urna, at fringilla eros venenatis quis.
Fusce vulputate dolor augue, ut porta sapien fringilla nec. Vivamus commodo erat felis, a sodales lectus finibus nec. In a pulvinar orci. Maecenas suscipit eget lorem non pretium. Nulla aliquam a augue nec blandit. Curabitur ac urna iaculis, ornare ligula nec, placerat nulla. Maecenas aliquam nisi vitae tempus vulputate.
Split This theme support splitting the page into as many columns as you wish.
Two column split Left Column Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Cras egestas lectus sed leo ultricies ultricies. Right Column Fusce ut leo turpis. Morbi consectetur sed lacus vitae vehicula. Cras gravida turpis id eleifend volutpat. Three column split Left Column Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Cras egestas lectus sed leo ultricies ultricies. Middle Column Aenean dignissim dictum ex. Donec a nunc vel nibh placerat interdum. Right Column Fusce ut leo turpis. Morbi consectetur sed lacus vitae vehicula. Cras gravida turpis id eleifend volutpat. Vertical Space Give vertical space between two lines.
This is line one. This is line two. It should have 4rem vertical space with previous line.
Video Video by Rahul Sharma from Pexels.
Mermaid Here, are few example of mermaid shortcode.
Graph:
graph LR; A[Hard edge] -->|Link text| B(Round edge) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result one] C -->|Two| E[Result two] Sequence Diagram:
sequenceDiagram participant Alice participant Bob Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you? loop Healthcheck John->>John: Fight against hypochondria end Note right of John: Rational thoughts prevail! John-->>Alice: Great! John->>Bob: How about you? Bob-->>John: Jolly good! Gantt diagram:
gantt dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD title Adding GANTT diagram to mermaid excludes weekdays 2014-01-10 section A section Completed task :done, des1, 2014-01-06,2014-01-08 Active task :active, des2, 2014-01-09, 3d Future task : des3, after des2, 5d Future task2 : des4, after des3, 5d Class Diagram:
classDiagram Class01 <|-- AveryLongClass : Cool Class03 *-- Class04 Class05 o-- Class06 Class07 .. Class08 Class09 --> C2 : Where am i? Class09 --* C3 Class09 --|> Class07 Class07 : equals() Class07 : Object[] elementData Class01 : size() Class01 : int chimp Class01 : int gorilla Class08 <--> C2: Cool label Git Graph:
gitGraph: options { "nodeSpacing": 150, "nodeRadius": 10 } end commit branch newbranch checkout newbranch commit commit checkout master commit commit merge newbranch ER Diagram:
erDiagram CUSTOMER ||--o{ ORDER : places ORDER ||--|{ LINE-ITEM : contains CUSTOMER }|..|{ DELIVERY-ADDRESS : uses The above quote is excerpted from Rob Pike’s talk during Gopherfest, November 18, 2015. ↩︎
